body.p: You can use to control a cloud VM as follows:

li.p: Start. Use the Start button in the toolbar.
Stop. Click the cloud VM name and select Machine, Stop. Menu options to shut down and power off the cloud VM are available.
Reset. Click the cloud VM name and select Machine, Reset. The cloud VM is stopped, then restarted automatically.
Terminate. Use the Terminate button in the toolbar.

note.p: This action deletes the instance from .

body.p: When you control a cloud VM in the machine list is updated automatically with the current instance state, such as Stopped or Running.
When you control an instance using the console, updates the status for the corresponding cloud VM automatically.
